alert.note: Alert for Prince George; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Prince George, northeastern Sussex and southwestern Surry Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Disputanta, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall of up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waverly around 800 PM EDT. Homeville around 805 PM EDT. Wakefield around 815 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Barham, Littleton and Newville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
